name: TechWave 2025
shortDetails: South Asia’s top tech minds gather to share innovation.
description: TechWave 2025 is Bangladesh's premier technology conference. It brings together developers, entrepreneurs, and investors from all over South Asia. This year’s theme focuses on AI innovations and sustainable development. Engage in hands-on workshops, networking sessions, and keynote talks. Meet top minds from the industry. Discover startup showcases and product launches. Perfect for both students and professionals. Food and drinks included. Come and innovate with us!
speaker: Tanvir Hasan

name: Creative Minds Art Fest
shortDetails: Celebrate art through exhibits, live painting & more.
description: Celebrate creativity and expression at the Creative Minds Art Fest. From live painting to digital art exhibits, explore talent from across the nation. Attend interactive art talks and hands-on sessions. Young and emerging artists will showcase their masterpieces. Discover rare art forms and meet galleries. Great place for content creators and photographers. Enjoy cultural performances in the evening. Family-friendly and open to all ages. Light refreshments available at venue.
speaker: Nusrat Imrose

name: Startup Bootcamp
shortDetails: Turn your startup idea into reality with real mentors.
description: Designed for early-stage entrepreneurs, this bootcamp helps turn ideas into action. You’ll learn startup fundamentals, growth hacking, and business modeling. Sessions cover pitching, branding, and team building. Connect with venture capitalists and startup mentors. Get real-time feedback on your product or service. Certificate included upon completion. Selected participants may receive incubation support. Free startup toolkit included. Great for students and founders. Limited seats available!
speaker: Rahim Reza

name: Health & Wellness Expo 2025
shortDetails: Boost your body and mind with expert wellness tips.
description: A day dedicated to physical and mental wellness. Participate in yoga, Zumba, and meditation workshops. Visit health booths for free checkups and tips. Meet nutritionists, therapists, and fitness experts. Talks on mental health, stress relief, and balanced diets. Learn how to make small lifestyle changes. Try organic food and healthy snacks. A family-friendly expo for all age groups. Giveaways and surprise gifts await attendees. Early registration recommended!
speaker: Dr. Farzana Karim

name: CodeCraft Hackathon 2025
shortDetails: 24-hour challenge to build next-gen digital solutions.
description: CodeCraft Hackathon brings together brilliant coders and problem solvers. Compete in teams to build creative software solutions. 24 hours of brainstorming, coding, and building. Challenges include AI, blockchain, and web apps. Prizes worth 1 lakh BDT. Mentorship from industry leaders throughout the event. Fun zones and food corners to recharge. Great networking opportunities. Final presentations judged by top tech founders. All participants get swag and certificates.
speaker: Shafiq Ahmed

name: MusicVerse 2025
shortDetails: Feel the beat live with top artists and crazy vibes.
description: Join us for a night of electrifying music and unforgettable vibes. Featuring Bangladesh’s top bands and surprise international guests. Food stalls, light shows, and open-air stage experience. Bring your friends, flags, and flashlights. Perfect for youth and music lovers. Multiple genres from rock to EDM. Safety and crowd management ensured. Merchandise stalls available. Gates open at 4 PM. Let’s make music memories together!
speaker: Sheikh Ishtiaque
